no.ntnu.diverslogbook.utils

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.diverslogbook.utils.Database

  • public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides global access to the database. Everything in this class should be references statically, since the class is made to be global, and should therefore not be instanciated.
    Author:
    Lars Johan
    See Also:
    Diver, FirebaseDatabase, DatabaseReference

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Database.OnDatabaseValueChanged
      A listener for all changes to the Diver-section in the database.
